product_overview: The Cession Management System is a comprehensive, enterprise-grade financial management platform designed for wage garnishment operations in Tunisia. It provides advanced client management, cession tracking, payment processing, financial analytics, and inventory management capabilities through a multi-platform application ecosystem including desktop, web, and mobile.
core_goals: Provide a robust client lifecycle management system with document handling and verification.
Enable real-time wage garnishment (cession) tracking with automated calculations and payment status monitoring.
Offer comprehensive financial management including income, expenses, and advanced reporting and analytics.
Support multi-language capabilities including Arabic (RTL), English, and French.
Deliver a secure authentication system with JWT-based role-based access control for USER and ADMIN roles.
Provide an integrated inventory and product management system with stock tracking and sales analytics.
Ensure cross-platform availability via native desktop (Tauri), web (PWA), and mobile (React Native) applications.
Maintain high security standards covering authentication, data protection, input validation, and infrastructure security.
key_features: Complete client management with CRUD, document uploads, search functionality, and analytics.
Salary cession management including creation, payment tracking, document generation, and status monitoring.
Financial tracking system supporting expense and income recording with detailed financial reports and charts.
Inventory management featuring product and category CRUD operations, stock tracking, and sales analytics.
JWT-based authentication with role-based access control ensuring secure user management.
Multi-language support including English, French, and Arabic with RTL layout support.
Cross-platform support for desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux), web (PWA), and mobile (iOS, Android) applications.
Smart dashboards with real-time KPIs, predictive analytics, and interactive charts powered by Chart.js.
Secure document management integrated with Supabase Storage for PDF uploads and downloads.
Comprehensive API endpoints covering authentication, clients, cessions, payments, products, expenses, income, documents, jobs, and workplaces.
user_flow_summary: User authentication via login/signup, with JWT token issuance and role assignment (USER or ADMIN).
Dashboard access presenting KPIs and analytics after successful login.
Client management flow including listing, searching, creating new clients, viewing detailed client profiles with related cessions and documents, and editing client information.
Cession management workflow covering listing cessions, creating new cessions, viewing details including payment tracking, and monitoring cession status.
Payment processing allowing users to record and track payments associated with cessions.
Financial management operations including tracking expenses, recording income, and generating financial reports and analytics.
Inventory and product management flow with product and category creation, editing, stock tracking, and sales analytics.
Settings configuration and user session management including logout and token refresh.
Multi-language switching with RTL support and offline capabilities in PWA and mobile apps.
validation_criteria: Successful JWT token validation and enforcement of role-based access control.
Comprehensive form validation on frontend and backend including all CRUD operations for clients, cessions, products, payments, and financial entries.
Secure file upload validations ensuring only allowed types (PDF) with virus scanning and correct storage.
Responsive UI rendering across device types and flawless RTL layout support for Arabic language.
Performance tests demonstrating efficient handling of large datasets, smooth chart rendering, and fast search functionalities.
Seamless frontend-backend API communication with correct data synchronization and error handling.
Security validations including input sanitization, SQL injection prevention, XSS and CSRF protections, and HTTPS enforcement.
Cross-platform application installation and functionality tests for desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux), web, and mobile platforms.
End-to-end workflows tested to validate user journeys from authentication through core business operations and financial reporting.
Audit logging accuracy and compliance with GDPR and security standards for data protection and user privacy.
